changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS service_providers ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(256 > LENGTH(name)), location TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(1024 > LENGTH(location)), type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(type)), status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(status)), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ );
